sentences.en: A new stocktaking system is currently under trial at the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 目前超市正在试用一种新的清点存货系统.

sentences.en: A new supermarket will be put up in this neighborhood next year.
sentences.cn: 明年要在这个居民区建一家超级市场.

sentences.en: Fresh salmon is a bargain at the supermarket this week.
sentences.cn: 这周超市的新鲜鲑鱼特价销售。

sentences.en: He openly shoplifted from a supermarket.
His eyes roved round the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛环视了一下超级市场。

sentences.en: I bought a keyboard in the supermarket yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天我在超市上买了个键盘.

sentences.en: I bought these cups at the supermarket — they're on offer this week.
sentences.cn: 我在超级市场买的这些茶杯——它们本周削价出售.

sentences.en: I'm going shopping at the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 我打算去超级市场购物.

sentences.en: It is useful to have a convenient supermarket.
Most of us do our food shopping in the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 我们大多数人在这家超市采购食品。
超市连锁店已经稍稍降价。

sentences.en: Supermarket lines are often cheaper than branded goods.
sentences.cn: 超市的商品常常比品牌货便宜。

sentences.en: The supermarket near our school will be reopened soon.
sentences.cn: 我们学校附近的那个超级市场不久将重新开业。

sentences.en: The supermarket operates a complimentary shuttle service.
sentences.cn: 这家超市提供免费购物班车.

sentences.en: The whole supermarket was ruined in a great fire.
sentences.cn: 整个超级市场被一场大火烧掉。

sentences.en: They bought food at the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 他们在超级市场买了食物.

sentences.en: They met and fell in love in a supermarket, of all places.
sentences.cn: 那么多地方，他们偏偏就在超市里相遇并相爱了。

sentences.en: Those who have lost their jobs struggle to pay their supermarket bills.
sentences.cn: 那些失业的人们想方设法以支付超市的账单。

sentences.en: Who do you think I knocked against in the supermarket this morning?
sentences.cn: 你猜,我今天上午在超级市场碰见谁了?

trans.tran_en: a very large shop that sells food, drinks, and things that people need regularly in their homes
a very large shop that sells food, drinks, and things that people need regularly in their homes
